page.title: 14ST.ANDREW'S CHURCH WILMCOTE
page.content: The{church}is made of Wilmcote stone, it is small and has no tower.It was made in 1841 for the{Oxford Movement.} As you walk into the church there is a visitors book which people from all over the world have signed.There are ornate designs on the walls,and {statues}of religious figures, carved by a man called Henry Farmer between 1943-1948.You can light a{candle}when you say a{prayer.}The{stained glass} windows are very colourful.The pulpit has drawings of Jesus. The organ is 5 years old,a man from Rugby made it.There is 1 bell that is rung before services.The{vicar}is Father Taylor and he lives next to the school.He leaves the church door open so that anyone can go in to pray. There is a graveyard which is looked after by local people.
